name: Mens Stone Island Hooded Jacket
description: A great item from this well known designer. It is great for these upcoming months with a velour type lining which really is a fantastic luxury, comfort and warmth. Obviously includes all stone island tags and bags and has the typical stone island badge on the left sleeve. -SIZES LARGE- 40-42 INCH CHEST. XL- 42-44 INCH CHEST.

name: Mens Stone Island Heavy Knitted Jumper
description: For this time of year this item is absolutely what you need to keep the chill out. Its heavy cotton material will be great for underneath a jacket or on the dryer days would be warm enough to wear on its own. The jumper has 4 buttons runing from the neck to approximately 1/4 of the way down. And obviously is fully tagged and bagged and also has the Stone Island Classic badge on the left sleeve. SIZES Large- 40-42 inch chest X-large- 42-44 inch chest

name: Mens Stone Island Full Zip and Press Stud Jumper
description: Another great item from Stone Island. This reall warm jumper is ideal for this time of year. It is extremely warm and has a full zip running down the centre of the item, with a press stud overlock. The jumper, because it is so thick can be worn under a jacket for extra warmth in the cold weather or can also be worn as a jacket itself on the dryer days. The item is of course fully bagged abd tagged and comes with the classic Stone Island badge on the left sleeve. SIZE MEDIUM- 38-40 INCH CHEST LARGE- 40-42 INCH CHEST X-LARGE – 42-44 INCH CHEST
